DESCRIPTION:
Castlevania: Lords of Shadow - A re-interpretation of mythology series Castlevania. The epic is set in a dark time when the union of Heaven and threaten the world evil and powerful forces - Lords of Shadow. Souls of the dead roam the earth shattered, unable to find peace, and evil creatures wreaked devastation, chaos and death among the living. And then there is you - Gabriel Belmont, a member of the Brotherhood of Light - An elite group of holy knights who protect the innocent from the supernatural. Beloved Gabriel, was brutally murdered by the evil forces, and her soul forever remains trapped between the worlds of the dead and the living. Seeing the terrible truth of what awaits humanity, she made Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹a conductor Gabriel to his destiny and save the world. Game includes HD graphics, all released at the moment supplement (Reverie and Resurrection), an updated storyline, which will be both old and new characters. Also in Castlevania Lords of Shadow Ultimate Edition users will experience previously unseen bosses and enemies and try to master the powerful weapons - Combat Cross.
